main event: A UFO sighting was reported on December 6, 1957, in Wayne, Michigan. The observation lasted for about 15 minutes, and the object was described as a round, white object the size of a light bulb, moving up and down.
interesting points: The document is a Project 10073 record card from the Project Blue Book archive, which was a U.S. Air Force program that investigated unidentified flying objects (UFOs).
The report suggests that the object was probably a balloon, based on its description, duration, and flight path.
There were no photographs present in the report, and the observer was a civilian.
The observer was asked to estimate the speed and distance of the object, and they were a 15-year-old student at the time of the sighting.
Another sighting in December 1957 reported a round, white object with the appearance of a ball of fire, moving slowly from northwest to southeast.
